channel.title: PrivateCluster on MADDIV
channel.description: Recent content in PrivateCluster on MADDIV

item.title: Case usage of Artifactory as container proxy for Quay and public images
item.description: Purpose DISCLAMER For purposes of installing and use OCP in private zone with limited internet access, there is a need to use Artifactory as a source for public container images (QUAI, public containers).
